casebody.data:
Vella TRADER, Personal Representative of the Estate of Thelma L. Degoede, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
COMERICA BANK, Formerly Known as Industrial State Bank & Trust Company, Defendant-Appellee SC: 158487
COA: 339577 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer submitted on November 12, 2018, is accepted for filing.
